import { useState } from "react"; import { Link} from "react-router-dom"; import { Book , Shelveoptions} from "./Book" const BookShelves = ( { books,userbooks ,MoveToShelve}) => { const [showSearchPage, setShowSearchpage] = useState(false); return (
{showSearchPage ? (
setShowSearchpage(!showSearchPage)} > Close
    ) : (

    MyReads

    {Shelveoptions.map(shelve => { return(

    Currently Reading

    ) })}
    Add a book
    )}
    ); } export default BookShelves
